source: 系统方法研究家庭和健康应该把握住复杂的网络 ，在这个网络里家庭成员都交织在一起，这个网络包括了多重家庭关系和更大的保健系统。
target: A systematic approach to family and health should take hold of a complex network where family members are intertwined, including multiple family relationships and a larger health care system.

source: 本文对家庭和成人健康相关文献进行系统性研究，72篇筛选出的文章依次按照主题进行解码，找到这个领域内的主要核心主题。
target: This article carried out systematic research on literature related to family and adult health, and 72 selected articles were decoded according to the topics in order to find the main core topics in this field.

target_errors.term: This article carried out systematic research on literature related to family and adult health

source: 结果表明有六大主题，其包括：家庭关系质量，家庭结构，健康和保健方面的行为因素，心理身体调节因素，看护情况，和老年人健康。
target: The results show that there are six main themes, including: quality of family relations, family structure, behavioural factors in health and health care, psychological and physical adjustment factors, care, and health of the elderly.

source: 研究结果支持在成人健康方面的研究中较少得到代表的家庭成员，而不仅仅是亲密伴侣。
target: The results of the study support the fact that fewer family members are represented in research on adult health, not just intimate partners.

target_errors.term: The results of the study support the fact that fewer family members are represented in research on adult health, not just intimate partners.

source: 但是，聚焦于成人家庭成员的家庭和健康相关研究很多都只关注亲密关系，也就是婚姻关系。
target: However, many family- and health-related studies focusing on adult family members focus only on intimate relationships, that is, marital relationships.

source: 成人维护的有强大影响力的家庭关系中还有很多其他的关系都被忽视了，而且随着年龄变大，越会对亲密关系更关注。
target: There are many other relationships that adults maintain in high-impact family relationships that are overlooked, and as they age, they become more concerned about intimate relationships.

source: 信号通路中风险基因的构成可能可以解释酒精依赖风险基因协同的神经生物学作用。
target: The composition of risk genes in signaling pathways may explain the synergistic neurobiological effects of alcohol-dependent risk genes.

target_errors.term: the synergistic neurobiological effects of alcohol-dependent risk genes.

source: 识别酒精依赖的风险基因和风险基因通路。
target: Identify alcohol-dependent risk genes and risk gene pathways.

target_errors.term: Identify alcohol-dependent risk genes and risk gene pathways.

source: 我们采用基因富集 (gene-set-rich) 分析方法对酒精依赖进行了基于通路的全基因组关联分析 (GWAS)。
target: We performed pathway-based genome-wide association analysis (GWAS) on alcohol dependence using gene-enrichment (gene-set-rich) analysis.

source: 在包括1409名欧裔美国人(European-American，EA)酒精依赖者和1518 名EA健康对照者的探索性样本人群中检测了近一百万个基因标志物。
target: Nearly one million gene markers were tested in an exploratory sample population of 1,409 European-American (EA) alcohol-dependent patients and 1,518 EA healthy controls.

source: 此外，将681名非裔美国人 (African-American, AA) 病例和508名AA健康受试者作为重测样本。
target: In addition, 681 African-American (AA) cases and 508 AA healthy subjects were used as re-test samples.

source: 我们发现了几个与酒精依赖显著相关的可重复的全基因组风险基因和风险通路。
target: We have found several reproducible genome-wide risk genes and risk pathways that are significantly associated with alcohol dependence.

source: 在多重比较Bonferroni校正后，“细胞- 细胞外基质相互作用”通路(EA样本中 一些基因和生物信号传导过程可能与酒精依赖的风险相关，本研究的发现为此提供了新的证据。
target: After multiple comparisons with Bonferroni correction, the "cell-extracellular matrix interaction" pathway (some genes and biological signaling processes in EA samples may be associated with the risk of alcohol dependence, and the findings of this study provide new evidence for this.

target_errors.term: After multiple comparisons with Bonferroni correction,

source: 李-佛美尼综合症是一种遗传性的疾病，大概一生中有90%的患癌几率，它要求家庭成员终身接受综合性癌症筛查。
target: Li-Fomeni syndrome is a hereditary disease with an approximate lifetime cancer risk of 90%. It requires family members to undergo comprehensive cancer screening for life.

target_errors.term: Li-Fomeni syndrome is a hereditary disease with an approximate lifetime cancer risk of 90%. It requires family members to undergo comprehensive cancer screening for life.

source: 本文研究医疗保健对管理李-佛美尼综合症风险和治疗过程中所起的作用，这些风险和治疗均由家长，青少年和成年孩子们来承担着。
target: This article investigates the role of healthcare in managing the risks and treatments of Li-Fomeni syndrome, which are borne by parents, teenagers and adult children.

target_errors.term: This article investigates the role of healthcare in managing the risks and treatments of Li-Fomeni syndrome, which are borne by parents, teenagers and adult children.

source: 使用草根理论方法，我们针对访谈文稿进行了开放式和集中式解码。
target: Using the grassroots theoretical method, we performed open and centralized decoding of the interview script.

target_errors.term: Using the grassroots theoretical method, we performed open and centralized decoding of the interview script.

source: 家庭成员描述了健康领袖的作用在家庭内如何实现的，还有孩子的成熟，某家庭成员的去世等因素，这些因素都决定了谁承担了什么角色，这些角色在一段时间范围内如何发生变化。
target: Family members describe how the role of a health leader is achieved within the family, as well as factors such as the maturity of the child and the death of a family member, which determine who takes on what roles and how these roles change over a period of time.

target_errors.term: Family members describe how the role of a health leader is achieved within the family, as well as factors such as the maturity of the child and the death of a family member, which determine who takes on what roles and how these roles change over a period of time.

source: 家庭成员通过陪同一起去就医来给与支持以及信息搜集的方式来实现他们的健康作用。
target: Family members come together to see a doctor to give support and collect information to achieve their health effects.

target_errors.term: Family members come together to see a doctor to give support and collect information to achieve their health effects.

source: 我们的研究结果提供了健康医疗供给方的看法，主要是关于LFS病人和他们的亲戚如何作出特殊的医疗决策和发挥照料者的角色，这些都深受LFS遗传性特性的影响，和这些角色如何随着时间而发生变化。
target: Our research results provide the perspective of health care providers, mainly on how LFS patients and their relatives make special medical decisions and play the role of caregivers, which are influenced by the hereditary characteristics of LFS and how these roles change over time.

target_errors.term: which are influenced by the hereditary characteristics of LFS and how these roles change over time.

source: 那些可以适应家庭角色动态变化的供给方可以较好地实现亲戚的社会心理和医疗的需要，主要是通过尽力理解承受LFS影响的家庭系统的功能，促进家庭成员们彼此的支持。
target: Those who can adapt to the dynamic changes in family roles can better meet the psychosocial and medical needs of relatives, mainly by trying to understand the functions of the family system affected by LFS and promote the support of family members to each other.

source: 参与研究的家庭有23个，采用半结构化的访谈。
target: There are 23 families participating in the study, using semi-structured interviews.

target_errors.term: There are 23 families participating in the study, using semi-structured interviews.

source: 家庭的组成有2-5个家庭成员，每个家庭的较年轻一代人年龄跨度7-40岁。
target: The family consists of 2 to 5 family members, and each family has a younger generation aged between 7 and 40 years.

source: 他们通常会表达集体性的共同责任，帮助亲戚理解LFS症和实施合适的癌症风险管理。
target: They often share a collective responsibility to help relatives understand LFS and implement appropriate cancer risk management.

source: 健康领袖的作用是代际间的，提供了必要的支持给家庭，特别是在复杂的医疗保健方面的决定。
target: The role of health leaders is intergenerational and provides the necessary support to families, especially in complex health care decisions.

source: DBDs 可以持续到成年期，带来诸多不良后果。
target: DBDs can continue into adulthood with many adverse consequences.

source: 在发达国家的高度贫困社区，针对DBDs的有效干预措施已经得到开发和测试。
target: In highly poor communities in developed countries, effective interventions for DBDs have been developed and tested.

target_errors.term: In highly poor communities in developed countries, effective interventions for DBDs have been developed and tested.

source: 研究过程涉及以下方面：初期组织校长和老师参加集会，介绍本研究的内容和干预措施的主要概念；在起始阶段组织乌干达团队对4Rs和2Ss相关内容进行了整体学习；邀请社区利益相关者积极参与并针对干预措施的内容和文化相关性提供更多的反馈；指导手册的最终修订版；收集儿童的绘画作品，以供编辑手册时使用。
target: The study process involves the following: organizing the principals and teachers to attend the meeting at the beginning to introduce the content of the study and the main concepts of the intervention; organizing the Uganda team to learn the relevant content of 4Rs and 2Ss at the initial stage; inviting community stakeholders to actively participate and provide more feedback on the content and cultural relevance of the intervention; final revision of the instruction manual; collecting the children's paintings for use in editing the manual.

source: 研究结果还强调了让社区利益相关者参与调适修改过程的重要性。
target: The findings also highlighted the importance of engaging community stakeholders in the adaptation process.

source: 作为一项随机测试的部分内容，本文调查研究了乌干达的30所学校中表现出行为问题的青少年及其他们的照顾者。
target: As part of a random test, this paper investigated adolescents and their caregivers who showed behavioral problems in 30 schools in Uganda.

target_errors.term: this paper investigated adolescents and their caregivers who showed behavioral problems in 30 schools in Uganda

source: 在乌干达，每五个儿童中就有一个孩子存在这样或那样的心理健康问题，其中包括破坏性行为障碍(DBDs )。
target: In Uganda, one out of every five children has such or similar mental health problems, including disruptive behavior disorders (DBDs).

source: 但是在乌干达这样的大多数非洲国家，相关的干预措施仍属罕见。
target: However, in most African countries such as Uganda, related interventions are still rare.

source: 该论文描述了一项源自美国的循证干预措施在乌干达的国情下如何尽可能优化并保持原有效度的调适过程。
target: The paper describes how an evidence-based intervention from the United States can optimize and maintain its original effectiveness in Uganda as much as possible.

source: 本文描述了原有干预措施和调整后的干预方案在内容方面以及实施方法上的异同。
target: This paper describes the similarities and differences between the original interventions and the adjusted interventions in terms of content and method of implementation.

source: 本研究旨在验证以下假设,即父母对孩童应对能力的培养(SOC)与孩子的情绪调节能力之间的关系是长期的。
target: The purpose of this study is to validate the hypothesis that the relationship between parental development of the child's coping ability (SOC) and the child's emotional regulation ability is long-term.

source: 纵向性的结构方程模型(SEM)分析的结果表明,在基线测量的父母SOC预测了孩子12个月后测量到的在情绪调节方面的适应和调适不良的结果。
target: The results of the longitudinal structural equation model (SEM) analysis showed that the parental SOC measured at baseline predicted the results of poor adaptation and adjustment in emotional regulation measured after 12 months in children.

source: 更具体地说,父母的积极培养孩子应对策略方面的建议预测了孩子情绪调节方面的适应性,而父母缺乏对孩童应对能力的培养则预测了孩子在情绪调节方面的不良调适能力。
target: More specifically, the parent's advice on active child development coping strategies predicts the child's adaptability in emotional regulation, while the parent's lack of coping with the child predicts the child's ability to adjust poorly in emotional regulation.

target_errors.term: parent's advice on active child development coping strategies

source: 样本来自256位父母,其孩子年龄在5至12岁之间(儿童平均年龄= 8.36,SD = 2.03,男性54.7%;父母平均年龄= 34.49,SD = 6.20,女性59%)。
target: Samples were obtained from 256 parents whose children were between 5 and 12 years of age (mean age of children = 8.36, SD = 2.03, and 54.7% of men; mean age of parents = 34.49, SD = 6.20, and 59% of women).

source: 参与者被要求在起始阶段和12个月时填写在线问卷,以供收集有关人口统计学信息,育儿行为和儿童情绪调节能力方面的数据。
target: Participants were asked to complete an online questionnaire at the initial stage and at 12 months to collect data on demographic information, parenting behavior, and children's ability to regulate emotions.

source: 此外,在家长积极培养应对策略与儿童情绪调节适应性之间的纵向联系中,儿童性别起了调节作用:尽管这种联系很小,对女孩来说相对微小,而对于男孩则较大,并且具有统计学的显著意义。
target: In addition, in the longitudinal connection between the active parental development of coping strategies and the child's emotional adjustment adaptability, the child's gender plays a regulatory role: although the link is small, it is relatively small for girls and large for boys, and it is statistically significant.

source: 本项研究结果强调了家长的SOC的重要性,因为它有可能提高5至12岁儿童的情绪调节能力。
target: The results of this study emphasize the importance of parental SOC as it may improve the emotional regulation ability of children aged 5 to 12 years.

source: 本研究旨在探索（1）过渡为家长期间，夫妻婚姻关系和与对方父母的冲突两者之间的双向关联性，以及（2）和父亲同住对上述关系的调适影响作用。
target: The purpose of this study is to explore (1) the two-way association between marital relationship and conflict with each other's parents during the transition to parenthood, and (2) the adaptation effect of cohabitation with the father on the above-mentioned relationship.

source: 使用二元调整量表和斯特赖克调整清单量表来评估婚姻关系以及与对方父母的冲突关系。
target: The binary adjustment scale and the Struck adjustment list scale were used to assess marital relationships and conflicting relationships with each other's parents.

source: 本研究丰富了我们对于和父亲同住这个因素对婚姻关系的作用的认知，并能指导基于特定文化的多维度干预方式的未来发展。
target: This study enriches our understanding of the role of this factor in marital relationships with fathers and can guide the future development of multidimensional interventions based on specific cultures.

target_errors.term: This study enriches our understanding of the role of this factor in marital relationships with fathers

source: 这些研究发现揭示了代际冲突的交叉时滞关联性。
target: These studies reveal the cross-temporality of intergenerational conflicts.

source: 同时，多群组分析表明，在妊娠期间与父母同住的受试组中，与对方父母的冲突会引发婚内问题；而不与父母同住的受试组中，在怀孕后期到产后期，与对方父亲之间的关系冲突可能强化婚姻问题。
target: At the same time, the multi-group analysis showed that the conflict with the other parent during pregnancy in the test group with the parents may lead to marital problems; in the test group without the same parent, the conflict with the other parent’s father may strengthen the marital problem in the post-pregnancy to post-partum period.

target_errors.term: conflict with the other parent during pregnancy in the test group with the parents may lead to marital problems; in the test group without the same parent, the conflict with the other parent’s father may strengthen the marital problem in the post-pregnancy to post-partum period

source: 过渡到为人父母的时期是新任父母们面临的最紧张的调适期之一，无论是与个体自我的关系还是与他者的关系。
target: The transition to being a parent is one of the most tense adaptation periods for new parents, whether they have a relationship with themselves or with others.

source: 针对这种过渡时期的代际关系之间的双向关联的研究非常有限，而且相互关系的复杂性也会根据生活居住情境的不同而变化。
target: Research on the two-way relationship between generations during this transition period is very limited, and the complexity of the interrelationship will vary depending on the living situation.

source: 本文的研究对象是359名已婚母亲，采用了三波前瞻性长期性研究设计。
target: This article is intended for 359 married mothers and uses a three-wave prospective long-term study design.

source: 研究相互关系时使用的是交叉时滞平面分析，确定这些关系是否随着生活情境的不同而呈现出不同的模式时使用的是多群组分析。
target: Cross-time lag plane analysis is used when studying interrelationships, and multi-group analysis is used to determine whether these relationships present different patterns depending on the circumstances of life.

source: 两个交叉－时滞模型表明，在怀孕中期至后期，婚内问题和与对方父母的冲突之间存在着双向关系。
target: Two cross-time lag models show that there is a two-way relationship between marital problems and conflicts with the other parent during the second to third trimesters of pregnancy.

source: 医疗保健专业人员有必要确保在过渡为父母的过程中，代际关系是积极有利的。
target: It is important for healthcare professionals to ensure that intergenerational relationships are positive and beneficial during the transition to parenthood.

source: 研究认为男子童年时期的不良经历（ACEs）和精神创伤症状与其IPV犯罪行为（亲密伴侣暴力）和被虐待经历是有关联的，但是针对暴力实施干预措施时起到阻碍作用的几个重要方面尚未得到深入研究。
target: The study found that the adverse experiences (ACEs) and mental trauma symptoms of boys in childhood were associated with their IPV crimes (intimate partner violence) and experiences of abuse, but several important aspects that hindered intervention against violence have not been studied in depth.

target_errors.term: The study found that the adverse experiences (ACEs) and mental trauma symptoms of boys in childhood were associated with their IPV crimes (intimate partner violence) and experiences of abuse,

source: 具体而言，创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）主导了该领域所研究的创伤症状的范围，限制了研究者对创伤的其他表现形式的理解，尤其是男子的创伤。
target: Specifically, post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) dominates the range of traumatic symptoms studied in this field, limiting researchers' understanding of other manifestations of trauma, especially that of men.

source: 此外，大多数研究只侧重于男性在身体方面的 IPV 犯罪行为，很少聚焦于诸如其他类型的 IPV行为、暴力严重程度或男性受迫害等研究方向。
target: In addition, most studies focus only on male IPV crimes in terms of body, and seldom focus on research directions such as other types of IPV behavior, severity of violence, or male persecution.

source: 另外，很少有研究关注基于ACE框架的可能性保护因素，例如临床人群的觉知行为。
target: In addition, few studies have focused on potential protective factors based on the ACE framework, such as cognitive behavior in clinical populations.

source: 最后，大多数研究的对象还尚未关注到有色人种，尽管一些种族/少数民族群体对IPV的接触率比较高。
target: Finally, most of the study subjects have not yet paid attention to colored races, although some ethnic/minority groups have a high exposure rate to IPV.

source: 基于以上原因，本研究调查了IPV的发生频率和严重程度（心理、身体、伤害）与ACES、PTSD、创伤症状学（与PTSD区别开来），还有觉知的自我效能之间的相互关联。
target: Based on the above reasons, this study investigated the correlation between the frequency and severity (psychological, physical, injury) of IPV and ACES, PTSD, traumatic symptomology (differentiated from PTSD), as well as the perceived self-efficacy.

target_errors.term: Based on the above reasons, this study investigated the correlation between the frequency and severity (psychological, physical, injury) of IPV and ACES, PTSD, traumatic symptomology (differentiated from PTSD), as well as the perceived self-efficacy.

source: 样本来自67个有色人种的男子，他们大多数属于低收入，正在参与虐妻行为干预计划。
target: Samples are from 67 men of color, most of whom are low-income men who are participating in an intervention program for abusive behavior.

target_errors.term: Samples are from 67 men of color, most of whom are low-income men who are participating in an intervention program for abusive behavior.

source: 超过一半的样本（51.5%）报告曾经经历过四次或四次以上 ACEs ，有31.1%的被研究对象 满足疑似 PTSD 病人诊断标准。
target: More than half of the samples (51.5%) reported having experienced four or more ACEs, and 31.1% of the subjects met the diagnostic criteria for patients with suspected PTSD.

source: 较高的 ACE 分数预测了几乎所有类型的自报 的较高IPV 犯罪率和较高的受害比例。
target: A higher ACE score predicts a higher IPV crime rate and a higher proportion of victims for almost all types of self-reported .

target_errors.term: A higher ACE score predicts a higher IPV crime rate and a higher proportion of victims for almost all types of self-reported .

source: PTSD 症状和复杂性创伤症状的严重程度综合在一起解释了 13% 到 40% 的 IPV 结果，而且每种结果都与某些类型的自报 的IPV 受害和暴力实施频率和严重程度有独特的关联性。
target: The severity of PTSD symptoms and complex traumatic symptoms combined account for 13% to 40% of IPV results, and each result has a unique correlation with the frequency and severity of certain types of self-reported IPV injury and violence.

source: 觉知的自我效能与犯罪行为和受害经历发生减少，自我报告的心理方面的IPV频率和严重程度呈减少趋势有关。
target: Perceived self-efficacy is associated with a decrease in criminal conduct and victim experience, and a decrease in the frequency and severity of self-reported psychological IPV.

target_errors.term: Perceived self-efficacy is associated with a decrease in criminal conduct and victim experience, and a decrease in the frequency and severity of self-reported psychological IPV.

source: 本研究综述了针对非主流的边缘化男性群体所采取的相关临床措施，包括筛查、培训和可能采用的治疗性干预方法。
target: This study reviewed the relevant clinical measures taken for the non-dominant marginalized male population, including screening, training and possible therapeutic interventions.

source: 它主要关注移民后应激源的影响 (包括庇护过程的时长和停留时间, 居住状态和社会融合) 以及它们对创伤后压力障碍, 焦虑和抑郁的影响。
target: It focuses on the impact of post-migration stressors (including the duration and duration of the asylum process, residence status and social integration) and their impact on post-traumatic stress disorder, anxiety and depression.

source: 家庭相关困难还被发现与停留时间和法律地位有关, 同时还认为其他移民后变量居住和停留时间对心理健康的影响更大。

source: 系统方法研究家庭和健康应该把握住复杂的网络 ，在这个网络里家庭成员都交织在一起，这个网络包括了多重家庭关系和更大的保健系统。
target: A systematic approach to family and health should take hold of a complex network where family members are intertwined, including multiple family relationships and a larger health care system.

source: 系统方法研究家庭和健康应该把握住复杂的网络 ，在这个网络里家庭成员都交织在一起，这个网络包括了多重家庭关系和更大的保健系统。
target: A systematic approach to family and health should take hold of a complex network where family members are intertwined, including multiple family relationships and a larger health care system.

source: 本文对家庭和成人健康相关文献进行系统性研究，72篇筛选出的文章依次按照主题进行解码，找到这个领域内的主要核心主题。
target: This article carried out systematic research on literature related to family and adult health, and 72 selected articles were decoded according to the topics in order to find the main core topics in this field.

source: 细胞焦亡是一种依赖半胱氨酸天冬氨酸蛋白酶（Caspase-1/4/5/11）的程序性死亡方式，主要特征是炎症小体激活，细胞膜破裂，形成孔洞，细胞内容物释放。
target: Cell pyroptosis is a programmed death that depends on cysteine aspartate protease (Caspase-1/4/5/11). It is mainly characterized by the activation of inflammatory bodies, rupture of the cell membrane, formation of holes, and release of cell contents.

source: 细胞焦亡作为一种新型的细胞死亡方式广泛参与呼吸系统的疾病，如肺纤维化、急性肺损伤/呼吸窘迫综合征、支气管发育不良、慢性阻塞性肺疾病和哮喘等。
target: As a new form of cell death, pyroptosis is widely involved in respiratory diseases, such as pulmonary fibrosis, acute lung injury/respiratory distress syndrome, bronchodysplasia, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, and asthma.

source: 本文综述细胞焦亡的发生机制以及在不同呼吸系统疾病中的作用，以期为呼吸系统疾病的治疗提供新思路。
target: This article reviews the mechanism of cell pyroptosis and its role in different respiratory diseases, in order to provide new ideas for the treatment of respiratory diseases.

source: 2019冠状病毒病(coronavirus disease 2019，COVID-19)目前已在世界范围内暴发流行，是世界性的重大公共卫生问题。
target: 2019 coronavirus disease (COVID-19) has now spread worldwide and is a major public health problem worldwide.

source: 肾也是病毒攻击的主要器官之一，病毒通过血管紧张素转换酶2(ACE2)直接损伤肾小管，并引起细胞因子风暴导致肾损伤，增加患者的死亡风险。
target: The kidney is also one of the main organs of viral attack. The virus directly damages the renal tubules through angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) and causes kidney injury caused by cytokine storm, increasing the risk of death in patients.

target_errors.term: The kidney is also one of the main organs of viral attack.

source: 严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒2(severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2，SARS-CoV-2)传染性极强，主要侵袭患者的肺，导致呼吸窘迫综合征甚至多器官衰竭。
target: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is highly infectious and mainly invades the patient's lungs, leading to respiratory distress syndrome and even multiple organ failure.

source: 早期排查COVID-19患者肾损伤危险因素，检测肾损伤指标，对存在肾损伤的患者及时进行支持治疗及肾脏替代治疗，可降低病死率。
target: Early screening of risk factors for renal injury in patients with COVID-19, detection of renal injury indicators, timely supportive treatment and renal replacement therapy in patients with renal injury can reduce the mortality rate.

source: 比较骨填充网袋椎体成形术（Vesselplasty）与经皮椎体后凸成形术（percutaneous kyphoplasty，PKP）治疗 Kümmell 病的临床疗效。

source: 分析利妥昔单抗联合CHOP/EPOCH方案治疗弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤（diffuse large B-cell lymphoma, DLBCL）患者的疗效，并探讨难治复发患者的高危因素. 对2012年12月-2018年12月东南大学附属中大医院血液科收治的72例初治DLBCL患者的临床资料进行回顾性分析，分析DLBCL患者应用利妥昔单抗联合CHOP/EPOCH方案化疗的缓解率。
target: To analyze the efficacy of rituximab in combination with CHOP/EPOCH regimen in the treatment of patients with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL), and to explore high-risk factors in patients with refractory relapse. To retrospectively analyze the clinical data of 72 patients with previously untreated DLBCL admitted to the Department of Hematology of Zhongda Hospital, Southeast University from December 2012 to December 2018, and analyze the response rate of DLBCL patients using rituximab in combination with CHOP/EPOCH regimen chemotherapy.

source: 结果显示，父母依恋与PTG有直接关联，两个显著的一阶间接（one-step indirect ）（通过公正信念和认知重新评估）关联PTG，两个显著的二阶间接关联（通过公正信念到安全感和通过认知到公正信念）和一个显著的三阶间接关联（通过安全感到公正信念到认知重评）。
target: The results showed that parental attachment was directly related to PTG, two significant first-order indirect (through fair beliefs and cognitive re-evaluation) related to PTG, two significant second-order indirect associations (through fair beliefs to a sense of safety and through awareness to a fair belief) and one significant third-order indirect association (through a sense of safety to a cognitive re-evaluation).

source: 结果表明，安全感，公正信念和认知重评中介了父母依恋与PTG之间的关联。

source: 本研究旨在阐明父母依恋对青少年创伤后生长（PTG）的影响机制。
target: The purpose of this study is to elucidate the mechanism of influence of parental attachment on post-traumatic growth (PTG) in adolescents.

source: 汶川地震发生9年半后，在872名中国青少年使用自我报告问卷进行了评估。
target: Nine and a half years after the Wenchuan earthquake, the self-report questionnaire was used to assess 872 Chinese adolescents.

source: 这些研究结果突出了家庭观点的重要性，临床心理学家可以通过帮助他们建立积极的父母依恋来促进青少年的PTG。
target: These findings highlight the importance of a family perspective, and clinical psychologists can promote PTG in adolescents by helping them build positive parental attachment.

source: 临床意义进行了讨论。
target: Clinical significance was discussed.

source: 目的 利用2100生物分析仪结合蛋白芯片获取死后大鼠肝组织蛋白质表达谱，推测其与死亡时间的关系。
target: Objective 2100 bioanalyzer binding protein chip was used to obtain the protein expression profile of post-mortem rat liver tissue, and its relationship with the time of death was speculated.

target_errors.term: 2100 bioanalyzer binding protein chip was used to obtain the protein expression profile of post-mortem rat liver tissue, and its relationship with the time of death was speculated.

source: 方法 大鼠腹腔麻醉致死后置于16 ℃环境中，提取死后14个时间点肝组织中的水溶性蛋白质，使用蛋白芯片获取相对分子质量在14 000~230 000的蛋白质表达谱数据，并利用主成分分析（principal component analysis，PCA）、偏最小二乘-判别分析（partial least squares-discriminant analysis，PLS-DA）、Fisher判别对数据进行分析。
target: Methods After death from abdominal anesthesia in rats, they were placed in a 16 °C environment, and water-soluble proteins in liver tissues at 14 time points after death were extracted. The protein chip was used to obtain protein expression profile data with relative molecular mass between 14,000 and 230,000, and the main component analysis (PCA), partial least squares-discriminatory analysis (PLS) was used to analyze the data.

target_errors.term: After death from abdominal anesthesia in rats, they were placed in a 16 °C environment, and water-soluble proteins in liver tissues at 14 time points after death were extracted.

source: 结果 根据蛋白质表达谱的变化和PLS-DA结果将死亡时间分为A组（0 d）、B组（1~9 d）、C组（12~30 d）。
target: Results According to the changes in protein expression profile and PLS-DA results, the time to death was divided into group A (0 d), group B (1-9 d) and group C (12-30 d).

source: 经Fisher判别，模型的训练集及测试集的预测准确率均为100.0%，训练集的内部交叉验证准确率为100.0%。
target: According to Fisher's judgment, the predicted accuracy of the training set and test set of the model was 100.0%, and the internal cross-validation accuracy of the training set was 100.0%.

source: 通过建立B、C组各时间点的Fisher判别模型缩小推断死亡时间窗口，B组中训练集及测试集的预测准确率均为100.0%，训练集的内部交叉验证准确率为100.0%；C组中训练集及测试集的预测准确率分别为95.2%、78.6%，训练集的内部交叉验证准确率为88.1%。
target: By establishing Fisher’s judgment model at each time point in Groups B and C, the inferred death time window was reduced. The predicted accuracy rate of the training set and test set in Group B was 100.0%, and the internal cross-validation accuracy rate of the training set was 100.0%. The predicted accuracy rates of the training set and test set in Group C were 95.2% and 78.6%, respectively, and the internal cross-validation accuracy rate of the training set was 88.1%.

target_errors.term: By establishing Fisher’s judgment model at each time point in Groups B and C, the inferred death time window was reduced.

source: 结论 蛋白芯片检测技术可以快捷简便地获取大鼠死后不同时间点肝组织相对分子质量在14 000~230 000的水溶性蛋白质表达谱，建立PLS-DA及Fisher判别模型对死亡时间进行分类预测判断，有望为死亡时间推断提供新的思路和方法。
target: Conclusion The protein chip detection technology can quickly and easily obtain the water-soluble protein expression spectrum of the relative molecular mass of liver tissues at different time points after death in rats, and establish the PLS-DA and Fisher judgment models to classify and predict the death time, which is expected to provide new ideas and methods for the inference of death time.

source: 回顾性分析2011年11月至2019年10月就诊于南京医科大学附属江宁医院血液科的具有完整随访资料的51例MM患者的临床资料。
target: The clinical data of 51 MM patients with complete follow-up data who visited the Department of Hematology of Jiangning Hospital, Nanjing Medical University from November 2011 to October 2019 were retrospectively analyzed.

target: Multivariate analysis showed whether maintenance therapy, blood calcium ≥ 2.6 mmol/L, and hemoglobin < 100 g/L were independent risk factors affecting the prognosis of MM.

source: 血钙≥2.6 mmol/L、血红蛋白＜100 g/L及不进行规律维持治疗的患者预后不良。
target: The prognosis of patients with blood calcium ≥ 2.6 mmol/L, hemoglobin < 100 g/L and patients who did not undergo regular maintenance was poor.

source: 摘要: 本文曾在2019年剑桥眼科专题研讨会进行讲演。
target: Abstract: This article was presented at the 2019 Cambridge Eye Symposium.

source: HS Dua从Dompe、Croma、Santen、Allergan和Thea获得酬金和差旅费, 并拥有NuVision biotherapies和GlaxoSmithKline的股份。

source: 化学性眼损伤 (Chemical eye injury, CEI) 是严重威胁视力和生命的急症, 通常发生在家里或工作场所, 前者一般较轻, 而后者较重, 并且双眼受累。
target: Chemical eye injury (CEI) is a serious vision- and life-threatening emergency that usually occurs at home or in the workplace. The former is generally mild, while the latter is severe, and both eyes are affected.

source: 碱烧伤导致组织皂化反应并且渗透组织的程度深。
target: Alkali burns result in a tissue saponification reaction and a deep degree of tissue penetration.

source: 酸损伤会导致组织快速凝固, 阻止渗透并使损伤局限。
target: Acid damage causes the tissue to clot quickly, preventing penetration and limiting the damage.

source: 刺激性物质——如酒精可造成表层上皮剥脱。
target: Irritant substances - such as alcohol can cause surface epithelial exfoliation.

source: 严重的化学损伤会影响整个眼前节结构, 造成虹膜、瞳孔及晶状体异常。
target: Severe chemical damage can affect the structure of the entire anterior segment of the eye, causing iris, pupil and lens abnormalities.

target_errors.term: the structure of the entire anterior segment of the eye,

source: 眼压受到的影响不一, 可能会降低或升高, 或从一开始的眼压情况迅速转变为另一种。
target: Eye pressure is affected differently, may decrease or increase, or rapidly change from the initial pressure condition to another.

target_errors.term: Eye pressure is affected differently, may decrease or increase, or rapidly change from the initial pressure condition to another.

source: 脉络膜视网膜血管病变被认为继发于眼前节炎症, 而不是因为CEI的直接作用。
target: Chorioretinal vascular lesions are considered secondary to anterior segmental inflammation, not due to the direct effects of CEI.

source: 化学性眼损伤 (Chemical eye injury, CEI) 是严重威胁视力和生命的急症, 通常发生在家里或工作场所, 前者一般较轻, 而后者较重, 并且双眼受累。
target: Chemical eye injury (CEI) is a serious vision- and life-threatening emergency that usually occurs at home or in the workplace. The former is generally mild, while the latter is severe, and both eyes are affected.

source: 在确定双眼PH值后, 通过大量和持久的眼部冲洗以防止进一步损伤, 以及寻找和清除所有微粒物质是关键。
target: After determining the PH value in both eyes, it is critical to prevent further damage through extensive and long-lasting eye irrigation, as well as to find and remove all particulate matter.

source: 眼内压易被忽视, 但必须对其进行评估和管理。
target: Intraocular pressure is easily overlooked, but it must be evaluated and managed.

source: 管理通常需要多学科的合作。
target: Management usually requires multidisciplinary cooperation.

source: NuVision Biotherapies是文中提到的Omnigen的制造商。
target: NuVision Biotherapeutics is the manufacturer of Omnigen mentioned in this article.

source: 严重的工作意外伤害还涉及其他身体部位的损伤, 可能与吸入或吞入化学物质有关。
target: Serious work-related accidental injuries also involve injuries to other parts of the body, which may be related to the inhalation or ingestion of chemicals.

source: 其他治疗原则包括对眼部的全面评估、控制炎症、促进愈合以及后遗症和并发症的预防及管理。
target: Other treatment principles include a comprehensive evaluation of the eye, control of inflammation, promotion of healing, and prevention and management of sequelae and complications.

source: 骨肉瘤是最常见的骨恶性肿瘤。
target: Osteosarcoma is the most common bone malignancy.

source: Notch信号通路在骨肉瘤细胞增殖中起重要作用，同时通过减少细胞内药物累积、调控上皮-间质转化、导致微RNA失调和细胞凋亡基因的表达紊乱、调节肿瘤干细胞等方面影响肿瘤的耐药性。
target: Notch signaling pathway plays an important role in osteosarcoma cell proliferation. At the same time, it affects tumor resistance by reducing intracellular drug accumulation, regulating epithelial-interstitial transformation, leading to microRNA dysregulation and expression disorder of apoptosis genes, and regulating tumor stem cells.

source: 从20世纪70年代起，人类就开始使用化学治疗药物来治疗骨肉瘤。
target: Since the 1970s, humans have started using chemotherapy drugs to treat osteosarcoma.

source: 然而，多药耐药作为影响化学治疗药物疗效的主要不良反应之一，在不同程度上降低了骨肉瘤患者的生存率。
target: However, multidrug resistance, as one of the main adverse reactions affecting the efficacy of chemotherapy drugs, reduces the survival rate of patients with osteosarcoma to varying degrees.

source: 对人工全膝关节置换术（total knee arthroplasty，TKA）及人工全髋关节置换术（total hip arthroplasty，THA）的围术期血液管理（perioperative blood managment，PBM）措施进行综述。
target: The perioperative blood management (PBM) measures for total knee replacement (TKA) and total hip replacement (THA) were reviewed.

source: 全面阅读并总结近年国内外关于 TKA 及 THA 的 PBM 措施的进展，结合四川大学华西医院临床实践经验，从优化造血、减少失血和输血三方面深入评价并分析各种措施的优劣，为临床选择提供依据。
target: We have comprehensively read and summarized the progress of PBM measures on TKA and THA at home and abroad in recent years, combined with the clinical practice experience of West China Hospital, Sichuan University, to further evaluate and analyze the advantages and disadvantages of various measures in terms of optimization of hematopoiesis, reduction of blood loss and blood transfusion, so as to provide a basis for clinical selection.

source: 目前用于 TKA 及 THA 的 PBM 方式较多，其中优化造血主要包括围术期应用铁剂及促红细胞生成素；减少失血措施包括使用止血带、术中进行控制性降压及围术期应用抗纤溶药物；自体输血主要包括预存自体输血、血液稀释法自体输血以及术中自体血液回输；而异体输血则为治疗贫血的最终手段。
target: Currently, there are many PBM methods used for TKA and THA, of which optimized hematopoiesis mainly includes perioperative use of iron and erythropoietin; measures to reduce blood loss include the use of hemostatic belt, intraoperative controlled blood pressure reduction and perioperative use of antifibrinolytic drugs; autologous blood transfusion mainly includes pre-existing autologous blood transfusion, hemodilution autologous blood transfusion and intraoperative autologous blood transfusion; different body transfusions are the final means of treatment for anemia.

source: 目前用于 TKA 及 THA 的 PBM 方式较多，其中优化造血主要包括围术期应用铁剂及促红细胞生成素；减少失血措施包括使用止血带、术中进行控制性降压及围术期应用抗纤溶药物；自体输血主要包括预存自体输血、血液稀释法自体输血以及术中自体血液回输；而异体输血则为治疗贫血的最终手段。

source: TKA 及 THA 围术期应根据患者身体及经济情况，个性化选择单一或多种血液管理措施以减少失血及异体输血需求，加速患者术后康复。
target: During the perioperative period of TKA and THA, a single or multiple blood management measures should be individually selected based on the patient’s physical and financial conditions to reduce blood loss and allogeneic blood transfusion needs and accelerate the patient’s postoperative recovery.

source: 使用ClustalX-2.1-win软件分析突变氨基酸的保守性，PROVEAN和MutationTaster在线生物信息学软件预测突变对蛋白质功能的影响，Swiss-PdbViewer软件在突变位点上进行蛋白质模型和氨基酸相互作用分析. 先证者PT和APTT较正常对照健康体检者显著延长，分别为34.2 vs 13.2 s和119.3 vs 36.0 s；FⅤ∶C和FⅤ∶Ag极度降低，分别为3％和6％。

PROVEAN and MutationTaster online bioinformatics software predicted the effect of mutations on protein function. Swiss-PdbViewer software performed protein model and amino acid interaction analysis on mutation sites. The PT and APTT of the pioneer were significantly longer than those of normal control healthy physical examination, which were 34.2 vs 13.2 s and 119.3 vs 36.0 s, respectively.

target: The predicted results of the two bioinformatics softwares were the same, and PROVEAN (scores -6.214 and -12.79) indicated that the compound heterozygous mutation was a harmful mutation; MutationTaster (scores 0.976 and 0.999) suggested that these mutations might cause the corresponding disease.

source: 研究急性早幼粒细胞白血病（APL）患者呼气成分中的挥发性有机化合物（VOC）特征，探讨VOC用于APL诊断及疗效评估的可行性. 以APL患者和健康人为研究对象，采用SPME-GC/MS技术检测受试者呼出气体中的VOC；比较分析APL初诊组、复发组、缓解组和健康组呼气中的VOC成分，使用Kruskal-Wallis方差分析APL不同疾病状态组特征性VOC差异并应用Dunn-Bonferroni检验进行两两比较. 初诊APL患者的二甲基硫醚、甲苯和十二烷值明显高于健康人，而乙醇、正己烷和苯甲醛值明显低于健康人（P<0.05）。
target: To investigate the characteristics of volatile organic compounds (VOCs) in the expiratory components of patients with acute promyelocytic leukemia (APL), and to investigate the feasibility of VOC for the diagnosis and efficacy evaluation of APL. Using the SPME-GC/MS technique to detect VOCs in the exhaled gases of subjects, the initial diagnosis of APL, the relapse group, and the remission group were compared with those of dimethylene and dimethylene.

target: Compared with the initial diagnosis group, dimethylsulfide, toluene and dodecane were significantly reduced in the remission group, and ethanol, n-hexane and benzaldehyde were significantly increased (P < 0.05), while VOC in the relapse group was opposite to that in the remission group. Dimethylsulfide, toluene, dodecane, ethanol, benzaldehyde and n-hexane could be used as biomarkers for the diagnosis and disease evaluation of APL.

source: 我们利用半扎根的研究方法分析了 20 个中低收入国家的初级卫生保健体系。
target: We analyzed the primary health care system in 20 low- and middle-income countries using a semi-rooted research approach.

source: 我们发现：(I) 尽管非传染性疾病负担日益沉重，但许多中低收入国家仍缺乏预防服务资金；(ii) 社区卫生工作者通常资源配备不足，无法获得良好的支持，并且缺乏相应培训；(iii) 在所研究的一半国家中，医疗自费超出卫生支出总额的 40％，不利于实现公平；(iv) 公共和私人体系分散、资金不足、腐败以及非正式员工参与不足，阻碍了健康保险计划的实施。
target: We found that (I) despite the increasing burden of non-communicable diseases, many low- and middle-income countries still lack funds for preventive services; (ii) community health workers are often under-resourced, do not have good support, and lack appropriate training; (iii) in half of the countries studied, medical out-of-pocket spending exceeds 40% of total health expenditure, which is not conducive to achieving equity; and (iv) public and private system dispersion, under-funding, corruption, and informal employee participation in health insurance programs.

target_errors.term: The results show that interventions designed for future development should focus on the needs of low-income partners.

Physicians who treat low-income partners must also be prepared to deal with a higher level of relationship tension, leading to multiple factors in their stressful living environment, which are uncommon when they treat more prosperous partners on a daily basis.

source: 长期摄入大量乙醇导致肠源性内毒素血症，活性氧、高浓度的三磷酸腺苷及尿酸激活焦亡系统，进而通过切割Gasdermin-D打孔机制导致肝细胞死亡，同时伴有白细胞介素-1β、白细胞介素-18等炎性因子的释放。
target: Long-term ingestion of large amounts of ethanol leads to enteric-derived endotoxinemia. Active oxygen, high concentrations of adenosine triphosphate and uric acid activate the pyrogenic system, which in turn leads to hepatocyte death by cutting the Gasdermin-D perforation mechanism, accompanied by the release of inflammatory factors such as interleukin-1 and interleukin-18.

source: 这一系列的过程激活免疫系统，介导级联炎症反应，促进酒精性肝病从脂肪变性到炎症、纤维化的进展。
target: This series of processes activates the immune system, mediates cascade inflammatory responses, and promotes the progression of alcoholic liver disease from steatosis to inflammation and fibrosis.

source: 含利妥昔单抗化疗方案治疗弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤致急性肺损伤患者26例临床分析. 通过总结分析弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤（DLBCL）患者应用含利妥昔单抗化疗方案后出现急性肺损伤的临床特点、治疗及预后，提高对该病的认识并指导临床治疗。
target: Clinical analysis of 26 patients with acute lung injury caused by diffuse large B-cell lymphoma treated with rituximab-containing chemotherapy regimen. The clinical characteristics, treatment and prognosis of acute lung injury after the use of rituximab-containing chemotherapy regimen in patients with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) were summarized and analyzed to improve the understanding of the disease and guide clinical treatment.

source: 选择本院2013年1月至2018年9月收治的26例应用含利妥昔单抗化疗方案并出现急性肺损伤的DLBCL患者，对其临床特征、影像学表现、化疗疗程、治疗效果及预后进行分析。
target: Twenty-six patients with DLBCL who were treated in our hospital between January 2013 and September 2018 with rituximab-containing chemotherapy regimens and experienced acute lung injury were selected for analysis of their clinical characteristics, imaging manifestations, chemotherapy course, therapeutic effect and prognosis.

source: 患者主要临床症状为发热、咳嗽及胸闷; 其中12例患者低氧血症, 3例患者I型呼吸衰竭; 胸部CT以双肺弥漫性磨玻璃影为主要表现，部分患者合并少量胸腔积液; 发病时间主要分布在2-4个疗程, 症状出现距方案中利妥昔单抗输注时间在8-49 d; 25例患者治疗有效后日常生活无明显受限, 1例患者治疗无效死亡。
target: The main clinical symptoms of the patients were fever, cough and chest tightness; among them, 12 patients had hypoxemia and 3 patients had type I respiratory failure; chest CT mainly showed diffuse ground-glass opacities in both lungs, and some patients had a small amount of pleural effusion; the onset time was mainly distributed in 2-4 courses of treatment, and the time to onset of symptoms was 8-49 days from rituximab infusion in the protocol; 25 patients had no significant limitation in daily life after effective treatment, and 1 patient died from treatment.

source: 含利妥昔单抗化疗方案治疗弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤致急性肺损伤患者26例临床分析. 通过总结分析弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤（DLBCL）患者应用含利妥昔单抗化疗方案后出现急性肺损伤的临床特点、治疗及预后，提高对该病的认识并指导临床治疗。
target: Clinical analysis of 26 patients with acute lung injury caused by diffuse large B-cell lymphoma treated with rituximab-containing chemotherapy regimen. The clinical characteristics, treatment and prognosis of acute lung injury after the use of rituximab-containing chemotherapy regimen in patients with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) were summarized and analyzed to improve the understanding of the disease and guide clinical treatment.

source: 然而，经典线性回归分析是假设该数据 为正态分布的，但是很多研究所获得的数据并不符合 这种假设。
target: However, the classical linear regression analysis assumed that the data were normally distributed, but the data obtained in many studies did not meet this assumption.

source: 但是，半参数模型对离散 数据相当敏感，因此在处理包含离散值的数据时产生 的估计值是不可靠的。
target: However, the half-parameter model is quite sensitive to discrete data, so the estimates generated when processing data containing discrete values are unreliable.

source: 在这种情况下，一些研究者在 删减这些极端值后再进行分析，但是，删减数据的事 先法则（ad-hoc rules）是基于主观标准的，所以不同 的调整方法就会产生不同的结果。
target: In this case, some investigators will perform analysis after deleting these extreme values. However, the principle of deletion of data (ad-hoc rules) is based on subjective criteria, so different adjustment methods will produce different results.

source: 等级回归为处理包 括离散值的非正态分布数据提供了更为客观的方法。
target: Rating regression provides a more objective way to process non-normally distributed data including discrete values.

source: 本文采用虚拟和实际数据来阐述这个非常有用的处理 离散值的回归方法，并与采用经典回归模型和半参数 回归模型所得出的结果进行比较。
target: This paper uses both virtual and actual data to illustrate this very useful regression method for the treatment of discrete values and to compare the results from the classical regression model and the semi-parametric regression model.

source: 线性回归模型被广泛应用于精神卫生和卫生服 务相关研究。
target: The linear regression model is widely used in studies related to mental health and hygiene services.

source: 解决该问题的方法之一是采用不要求数据 为正态分布的半参数模型。
target: One way to solve this problem is to adopt a semi-parametric model that does not require data to be normally distributed.

source: 直接抗病毒药物（DAAs），是治疗慢性乙型肝炎的重要手段。
target: Direct antiviral drugs (DAAs) are an important means of treating chronic hepatitis B.

source: DAAs能直接干扰病毒的感染复制过程，减少子代病毒产率，继而影响体内乙型肝炎病毒（HBV）的两种动态平衡，即肝细胞中病毒复制-循环中病毒衰减之间的平衡，共价闭合环状DNA（cccDNA）池补充-cccDNA衰减之间的平衡。
target: DAAs can directly interfere with the viral infection replication process, reduce the offspring virus yield, and then affect the two dynamic equilibriums of hepatitis B virus (HBV) in the body, that is, the balance between virus replication-circulation virus attenuation in hepatocytes, and the balance between covalently closed cyclic DNA (cccDNA) pool supplementation-ccDNA attenuation.

source: DAAs能直接干扰病毒的感染复制过程，减少子代病毒产率，继而影响体内乙型肝炎病毒（HBV）的两种动态平衡，即肝细胞中病毒复制-循环中病毒衰减之间的平衡，共价闭合环状DNA（cccDNA）池补充-cccDNA衰减之间的平衡。
target: DAAs can directly interfere with the viral infection replication process, reduce the offspring virus yield, and then affect the two dynamic equilibriums of hepatitis B virus (HBV) in the body, that is, the balance between virus replication-circulation virus attenuation in hepatocytes, and the balance between covalently closed cyclic DNA (cccDNA) pool supplementation-ccDNA attenuation.

source: 现从cccDNA池补充-cccDNA衰减这一平衡的两个方面，探讨近期DAAs研发的主要进展。
target: At present, we will explore the main progress of recent DAAs research and development by supplementing the balance of -cccDNA attenuation from the cccDNA pool.

source: 因此，靶向HBV感染复制的不同环节，开发新型DAAs十分必要。
target: Therefore, it is necessary to develop new DAAs by targeting different stages of HBV infection replication.
